definition: promoter/advocate/driving force/pushing hands (two-person training routine esp. in t'ai chi)
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: These issues will be prime movers in the currency markets as unrest expands.
sentences.chinese: 隨着動盪局面加劇，這些問題將是匯市的主推手。

sentences.english: Taichi Sanshou is the extension of Taichi push-hands exercise.
sentences.chinese: 太極散手是太極推手技法的延伸。

sentences.english: Fry Everyman on the network red, it is the one share that the network pushs handiwork to make only.
sentences.chinese: 把普通人在網絡上炒紅，只是網絡推手工作的一部分。

sentences.english: We must watch out some ill-intentioned Internet planners who are trying to mislead public opinion.
sentences.chinese: 我們要警惕某些惡意網路推手企圖誤導輿論。

sentences.english: Fixed and restricted step Push Hands can be described in the following way.
sentences.chinese: 定步推手用以下的步驟和方法。

sentences.english: Ideology was a big part of what drove the war.
sentences.chinese: 意識形態在很大程度上成爲了戰爭的推手。

sentences.english: The two taijiquan boxers were practising hand-pushing exercise in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 這兩名太極拳手正在院子裏練習推手。

sentences.english: Chinese and English Introductions Taichi Sanshou is the extension of Taichi push-hands exercise.
sentences.chinese: 太極散手是太極推手技法的延伸。

sentences.english: Taichi Push-hands Exercise is a duel event between two bare-handed people, and therefore has a feature of duel between two opponents.
sentences.chinese: 太極推手是太極拳運動一項兩人徒手對練的項目。

sentences.english: The government is, in some respects, the architect of this mess.
sentences.chinese: 從某些角度看，政府正是製造這場混亂的幕後推手。

sentences.english: Who is Zhang Xinming driving force behind the exodus?
sentences.chinese: 誰是張新明出逃的幕後推手？

sentences.english: Ren is one of the marketing brains behind Old Boys.
sentences.chinese: 任就是老男孩的幕後推手之一。

sentences.english: The question then becomes, what’s behind all this extreme weather?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，問題成了什麼是所有這些極端天氣背後的推手？

definition: to push the wave and add to the billows (idiom); to add momentum/to encourage sth to get bigger/to add fuel to the fire
to borrow sb's authority/to seize an opportunity
to bolster/to give a boost to (the economy etc)
behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
lit. four ounces can move a thousand catties (idiom)/fig. to achieve much with little effort
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to boost support or interest/to campaign/to promote
lit. the first person to bury funerary dolls (idiom)/fig. the originator of an evil practice
